title: Vampire mage (GruntHack)
html:
Vampire mage (GruntHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
V vampire mage
Difficulty 27
Attacks Claw 2d8 drain life, Bite 1d8 drain life, Spell-casting 2d6
V vampire mage
Difficulty 27
Attacks

Claw 2d8 drain life, Bite 1d8 drain life, Spell-casting 2d6

Base level 20
Base experience 816
Speed 14
Base AC -4
Base MR 50
Alignment -9 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size Medium
Resistances sleep, poison, level drain
Resistances conveyed None

A vampire mage:

  • can fly.
  • does not breathe.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • regenerates HP quickly.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is undead.
  • is a lord to its kind.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • is a vampire.

This article is about monster as it appears in GruntHack. For the monster in the original code or other variants, see vampire mage.

A vampire mage, V, is a type of monster that appears in GruntHack, and is implemented from the deferred monster in the code of NetHack. Like other vampires in GruntHack, the vampire mage is a racial monster that is considerably stronger than a vampire lord - he shares the same traits as his undead vampire kin, will seek out and pick up magical items, and is a lord to his kind.

Vampire mages possess a claw attack and bite attack that can drain life, and will attempt to cast one mage monster spell for each round of combat.

Generation

Randomly generated vampire mages are always hostile.

A vampire mage leaves behind an old corpse matching the racial monster they were upon death.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''vampire mage''', {{monsym|vampire mage}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[GruntHack]], and is implemented from the deferred monster in the code of ''[[NetHack]]''. Like other [[Vampire (monster class)|vampires]] in GruntHack, the vampire mage is a [[racial monster]] that is considerably stronger than a [[Vampire lord (GruntHack)|vampire lord]] - he shares the same traits as his [[undead]] vampire kin, will seek out and pick up [[magical item]]s, and is a [[M2 LORD|lord]] to his kind.

Vampire mages possess a claw attack and bite attack that can [[drain life]], and will attempt to cast one mage [[monster spell]] for each round of combat.

==Generation==
Randomly generated vampire mages are always hostile.

A vampire mage leaves behind an [[old]] [[corpse]] matching the racial monster they were upon death.
